Being made fun of!

By tigerbubble on Sunday, January 20, 2002 - 01:22 pm:

When you fight in a contest that your monster easily dominates, and after it you monster feels like it was being made fun of, does that affect your monster in training or future battles? I personaly have't noticed any affects, but i dont know if i am just not seeing it. Has anyone noticed anything with this?

By Omni Strunks on Monday, January 21, 2002 - 12:58 pm:

I don't see any difference to it...except it might end up with a negative characteristic.

Just what I think.

By DigMoshMogi on Monday, January 21, 2002 - 01:58 pm:

I sometimes get it if I accidentally say 'no problem' when it fails a drill.
